narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
Applicant is ready to be licensed as a Class A dealer. License fee must be submitted to the Regional Office to
receive the USDA license. Send a copy of the inspection report and license fee to the following address:
USDA APHIS Animal Care
2150 Centre Avenue.
Building B, Mail Stop # 3W11
Fort Collins, CO 80526-8117
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the manager.
